name: Electrode
flavorText:
It stores electric
energy under very
high pressure. It often explodes
with little or no
provocation.

previous.name: Voltorb
previous.flavorText:
Usually found in
power plants.
Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL,
they have zapped
many people.

next.name: Exeggcute
next.flavorText:
Often mistaken
for eggs.
When disturbed, they quickly
gather and attack
in swarms.
